question: q34
question_label: If you were to receive a survey invitation with an incentive/reward that gave you 100% of your incentive payment via a prepaid Visa card and then also gave 5% of the incentive value to a charity of your choice, would that incentive offer interest you?
response: It would become my preferred incentive offer
